class.rdfs:comment: An organization such as a school, NGO, corporation, club, etc.
class.rdfs:label: Organization

schema:actionableFeedbackPolicy.rdfs:comment: For a [[NewsMediaOrganization]] or other news-related [[Organization]], a statement about public engagement activities (for news media, the newsroomâs), including involving the public - digitally or otherwise -- in coverage decisions, reporting and activities after publication.
schema:actionableFeedbackPolicy.rdfs:label: actionableFeedbackPolicy

schema:aggregateRating.rdfs:comment: The overall rating, based on a collection of reviews or ratings, of the item.
schema:aggregateRating.rdfs:label: aggregateRating

schema:areaServed.rdfs:comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided.
schema:areaServed.rdfs:label: areaServed

schema:award.rdfs:comment: An award won by or for this item.
schema:award.rdfs:label: award

schema:awards.rdfs:comment: Awards won by or for this item.
schema:awards.rdfs:label: awards

schema:brand.rdfs:comment: The brand(s) associated with a product or service, or the brand(s) maintained by an organization or business person.
schema:brand.rdfs:label: brand

schema:contactPoint.rdfs:comment: A contact point for a person or organization.
schema:contactPoint.rdfs:label: contactPoint

schema:contactPoints.rdfs:comment: A contact point for a person or organization.
schema:contactPoints.rdfs:label: contactPoints

schema:correctionsPolicy.rdfs:comment: For an [[Organization]] (e.g. [[NewsMediaOrganization]]), a statement describing (in news media, the newsroomâs) disclosure and correction policy for errors.
schema:correctionsPolicy.rdfs:label: correctionsPolicy

schema:department.rdfs:comment: A relationship between an organization and a department of that organization, also described as an organization (allowing different urls, logos, opening hours). For example: a store with a pharmacy, or a bakery with a cafe.
schema:department.rdfs:label: department

schema:dissolutionDate.rdfs:comment: The date that this organization was dissolved.
schema:dissolutionDate.rdfs:label: dissolutionDate

schema:diversityPolicy.rdfs:comment: Statement on diversity policy by an [[Organization]] e.g. a [[NewsMediaOrganization]]. For a [[NewsMediaOrganization]], a statement describing the newsroomâs diversity policy on both staffing and sources, typically providing staffing data.
schema:diversityPolicy.rdfs:label: diversityPolicy

schema:diversityStaffingReport.rdfs:comment: For an [[Organization]] (often but not necessarily a [[NewsMediaOrganization]]), a report on staffing diversity issues. In a news context this might be for example ASNE or RTDNA (US) reports, or self-reported.
schema:diversityStaffingReport.rdfs:label: diversityStaffingReport

schema:duns.rdfs:comment: The Dun & Bradstreet DUNS number for identifying an organization or business person.
schema:duns.rdfs:label: duns

schema:ethicsPolicy.rdfs:comment: Statement about ethics policy, e.g. of a [[NewsMediaOrganization]] regarding journalistic and publishing practices, or of a [[Restaurant]], a page describing food source policies. In the case of a [[NewsMediaOrganization]], an ethicsPolicy is typically a statement describing the personal, organizational, and corporate standards of behavior expected by the organization.
schema:ethicsPolicy.rdfs:label: ethicsPolicy

schema:event.rdfs:comment: Upcoming or past event associated with this place, organization, or action.
schema:event.rdfs:label: event

schema:events.rdfs:comment: Upcoming or past events associated with this place or organization.
schema:events.rdfs:label: events

schema:founder.rdfs:comment: A person who founded this organization.
schema:founder.rdfs:label: founder

schema:founders.rdfs:comment: A person who founded this organization.
schema:founders.rdfs:label: founders

schema:foundingDate.rdfs:comment: The date that this organization was founded.
schema:foundingDate.rdfs:label: foundingDate

schema:foundingLocation.rdfs:comment: The place where the Organization was founded.
schema:foundingLocation.rdfs:label: foundingLocation

schema:funder.rdfs:comment: A person or organization that supports (sponsors) something through some kind of financial contribution.
schema:funder.rdfs:label: funder

schema:globalLocationNumber.rdfs:comment: The [Global Location Number](http://www.gs1.org/gln) (GLN, sometimes also referred to as International Location Number or ILN) of the respective organization, person, or place. The GLN is a 13-digit number used to identify parties and physical locations.
schema:globalLocationNumber.rdfs:label: globalLocationNumber

schema:hasCredential.rdfs:comment: A credential awarded to the Person or Organization.
schema:hasCredential.rdfs:label: hasCredential

schema:hasMerchantReturnPolicy.rdfs:comment: Indicates a MerchantReturnPolicy that may be applicable.
schema:hasMerchantReturnPolicy.rdfs:label: hasMerchantReturnPolicy

schema:hasOfferCatalog.rdfs:comment: Indicates an OfferCatalog listing for this Organization, Person, or Service.
schema:hasOfferCatalog.rdfs:label: hasOfferCatalog

schema:hasPOS.rdfs:comment: Points-of-Sales operated by the organization or person.
schema:hasPOS.rdfs:label: hasPOS

schema:hasProductReturnPolicy.rdfs:comment: Indicates a ProductReturnPolicy that may be applicable.
schema:hasProductReturnPolicy.rdfs:label: hasProductReturnPolicy

schema:interactionStatistic.rdfs:comment: The number of interactions for the CreativeWork using the WebSite or SoftwareApplication. The most specific child type of InteractionCounter should be used.
schema:interactionStatistic.rdfs:label: interactionStatistic

schema:isicV4.rdfs:comment: The International Standard of Industrial Classification of All Economic Activities (ISIC), Revision 4 code for a particular organization, business person, or place.
schema:isicV4.rdfs:label: isicV4

schema:knowsAbout.rdfs:comment: Of a [[Person]], and less typically of an [[Organization]], to indicate a topic that is known about - suggesting possible expertise but not implying it. We do not distinguish skill levels here, or relate this to educational content, events, objectives or [[JobPosting]] descriptions.
schema:knowsAbout.rdfs:label: knowsAbout

schema:knowsLanguage.rdfs:comment: Of a [[Person]], and less typically of an [[Organization]], to indicate a known language. We do not distinguish skill levels or reading/writing/speaking/signing here. Use language codes from the [IETF BCP 47 standard](http://tools.ietf.org/html/bcp47).
schema:knowsLanguage.rdfs:label: knowsLanguage

schema:legalName.rdfs:comment: The official name of the organization, e.g. the registered company name.
schema:legalName.rdfs:label: legalName

schema:leiCode.rdfs:comment: An organization identifier that uniquely identifies a legal entity as defined in ISO 17442.
schema:leiCode.rdfs:label: leiCode

schema:location.rdfs:comment: The location of, for example, where an event is happening, where an organization is located, or where an action takes place.
schema:location.rdfs:label: location

schema:makesOffer.rdfs:comment: A pointer to products or services offered by the organization or person.
schema:makesOffer.rdfs:label: makesOffer

schema:member.rdfs:comment: A member of an Organization or a ProgramMembership. Organizations can be members of organizations; ProgramMembership is typically for individuals.
schema:member.rdfs:label: member

schema:memberOf.rdfs:comment: An Organization (or ProgramMembership) to which this Person or Organization belongs.
schema:memberOf.rdfs:label: memberOf

schema:naics.rdfs:comment: The North American Industry Classification System (NAICS) code for a particular organization or business person.
schema:naics.rdfs:label: naics

schema:nonprofitStatus.rdfs:comment: nonprofit Status indicates the legal status of a non-profit organization in its primary place of business.
schema:nonprofitStatus.rdfs:label: nonprofitStatus

schema:numberOfEmployees.rdfs:comment: The number of employees in an organization e.g. business.
schema:numberOfEmployees.rdfs:label: numberOfEmployees

schema:ownershipFundingInfo.rdfs:comment: For an [[Organization]] (often but not necessarily a [[NewsMediaOrganization]]), a description of organizational ownership structure; funding and grants. In a news/media setting, this is with particular reference to editorial independence.   Note that the [[funder]] is also available and can be used to make basic funder information machine-readable.
schema:ownershipFundingInfo.rdfs:label: ownershipFundingInfo

schema:owns.rdfs:comment: Products owned by the organization or person.
schema:owns.rdfs:label: owns

schema:parentOrganization.rdfs:comment: The larger organization that this organization is a [[subOrganization]] of, if any.
schema:parentOrganization.rdfs:label: parentOrganization

schema:publishingPrinciples.rdfs:comment:
The publishingPrinciples property indicates (typically via [[URL]]) a document describing the editorial principles of an [[Organization]] (or individual e.g. a [[Person]] writing a blog) that relate to their activities as a publisher, e.g. ethics or diversity policies. When applied to a [[CreativeWork]] (e.g. [[NewsArticle]]) the principles are those of the party primarily responsible for the creation of the [[CreativeWork]].

While such policies are most typically expressed in natural language, sometimes related information (e.g. indicating a [[funder]]) can be expressed using schema.org terminology.
schema:publishingPrinciples.rdfs:label: publishingPrinciples

schema:seeks.rdfs:comment: A pointer to products or services sought by the organization or person (demand).
schema:seeks.rdfs:label: seeks

schema:serviceArea.rdfs:comment: The geographic area where the service is provided.
schema:serviceArea.rdfs:label: serviceArea

schema:slogan.rdfs:comment: A slogan or motto associated with the item.
schema:slogan.rdfs:label: slogan

schema:sponsor.rdfs:comment: A person or organization that supports a thing through a pledge, promise, or financial contribution. e.g. a sponsor of a Medical Study or a corporate sponsor of an event.
schema:sponsor.rdfs:label: sponsor

schema:subOrganization.rdfs:comment: A relationship between two organizations where the first includes the second, e.g., as a subsidiary. See also: the more specific 'department' property.
schema:subOrganization.rdfs:label: subOrganization

schema:taxID.rdfs:comment: The Tax / Fiscal ID of the organization or person, e.g. the TIN in the US or the CIF/NIF in Spain.
schema:taxID.rdfs:label: taxID

schema:unnamedSourcesPolicy.rdfs:comment: For an [[Organization]] (typically a [[NewsMediaOrganization]]), a statement about policy on use of unnamed sources and the decision process required.
schema:unnamedSourcesPolicy.rdfs:label: unnamedSourcesPolicy

schema:vatID.rdfs:comment: The Value-added Tax ID of the organization or person.
schema:vatID.rdfs:label: vatID
